metadata.title: CVE-2020-15685 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: During the plaintext phase of the STARTTLS connection setup, protocolcommands could have been injected and evaluated within the encryptedsession. This vulnerability affects Thunderbird < 78.7.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
